english.segment1: I lived a lot of life. I caught a dream or two. It's been a sweet ride
english.segment2: But I've faced my share of nights. Searched like we all do. Looking inside
english.segment3: Now I'm standing here. 'Cause You've made it clear
english.segment4: This heart inside me beats because. You loved enough to take my cross. I'm alive. You gave Your life to shatter death. So even after my last breath. I'm alive. I'm finally wide awake. I'm finished being know. It's a new day
english.segment5: I feel it on my face. In hope's a midnight sun. That won't fade
english.segment6: I'm bowing down. And I'm crying out
english.segment7: This heart inside me beats because. You loved enough to take my cross. I'm alive. You gave Your life to shatter death. So even after my last breath. I'm alive
